Mary C Pugh CT's Top Justice of the Peace

CT Justice of the Peace   Also  Notary Public. www.ct-jp.comNo residency requirement, No Blood test - No waiting PeriodCan get married in about 90 minutes.#1 Justice of the Peace in CT - performing 350++ ceremonies a year. I enjoy helping my couples have a  personal customized wedding. I give CT residents a free planning site with vows, ceremony ideas/tips.  I develop personal vows that are customized to them.  I give my bridal couples a gift of the portfolio that contains their wedding certificate (printed on blue parchment paper with an embossed seal and placed in the laser cut portfolio) and their customized vows.After the wedding, I send my couples a personal photo file that has snapshots I took of the wedding,  the digital file of the certificate I created for them and the wedding vows.  I also send them instructions on how to obtain their official certified copy.

Campaign Manager for successful Bob Duff campaigns Currently Senate Majority Leader in CTRe-election campaign:  2006  67% win- 70% of Norwalk, 44% of Darien (Rep leaning district). 2004:  58% win in a very difficult district (25th) (position was held by the opposing party for over 14 years).Also managed his wins for State Rep in 2001 (he took Alex Knopp's seat in a special election), and 2002Alex Knopp- Mayor of Norwalk.Have worked with Alex Knopp since 1992 (when his district was re-districted and he lost most of his constituency and post his vote FOR the income tax).  It looked unlikely that he would be re-elected, but with skillful database management and targeted communications, he won and won again in 94, 96 98, ran for Mayor in 2000 and helped him not only WIN but swept in the entire democratic ticket (helped the various candidates with database, fundraising, communications and web sites.).
